attributes.additional_details:
My cousin is in remission for cancer he is 18 year old, all though he doesn't finish treatment until July 2015 his disability allowance is being stopped Dec 2014 as he will no longer be classed as bed bound. There are so many false claims for disability allowance. Proof of treatment can be given to those in remission, the chance to recover 100% is crucial.
Change this and at least allow 6 months to a year after treatments finished.
